title: This is what Stormi thinks of her mom's singing skills
text:
This is what Stormi thinks of her mom's singing skills

Cape Town - Makeup mogul and reality TV star Kylie Jenner recently found herself in the middle of a Twitter meme storm after a snippet from her YouTube video went viral.

In the snippet, Kylie can be seen singing Rise and Shine to her daughter, Stormi, who is sitting inside a cot. While many found this cute, others were astonished at Kylie’s vocals and others kept editing it to make a song out of the video.

Participating in all the fun, Kylie played a remixed version of her song for 1-year-old Stormi and captured a video of the tot enjoying and dancing to the song. However, Stormi could not believe her mother had recorded the tune and kept asking whether her rapper father, Travis Scott, was the one singing.

"Daddy’s singing?" Stormi asks to which Kylie responds,

"You like it? No, baby, that’s mommy singing."

Stormi does not buy what Kylie is saying and emphasises that Travis was the one singing.

"Oh, you want Daddy singing? I’m not good enough?" Kylie asks and Stormi responds, "Yes, Daddy’s singing. Daddy’s singing!"

Take a look at the cute video below.
description: Participating in all the fun, Kylie played a remixed version of her “song” for 1-year-old Stormi and captured a video of the tot enjoying and dancing to the song.
